name: Greyhound Racing Tournament 2
description:
If you like the animal race then you will love this amazing and realistic dog race. Race with other dog rivals, do some insane stunts and crazy high jumps. Test your dog skills while jumping over the challenging hurdles on the tracks. In this wild dog animal race tournament game, shows that you have the skills to win every race. Release the wild crazy hounds and run against time with your favorite animal: dog in the ultimate stunt and race competition. Conquer the victory by running on the racing tracks and become the champion.

Your main objective in this dog simulation is you have to race your dog against other cute dogs; you have to come first in the race within the given limited time. This is a lapping game where you have to tap on the race button to run your dog faster and win the race. At the end of every race you will get cash to unlock fastest dogs to win the race easily. While running your dog in game does not collide with other cute dogs or obstacles. Have you got what it takes to become the champion in dog racing? If yes then play and test your skills. Show your real racing skills, cross the finish line first with your dog and become the legend in dog racing. If you do not come first in race or your given time is over then you have to start your mission again.

This simulation will give you HD graphics, 3d Racing tracks, cool animations, easy and smooth controls, interesting and challenging missions and effective sounds. This game contains no violence or any mature content, so you can play this game with your children. You can play this game offline without any internet connection.

How to Play:
• Tap the run icon to increase the dog speed
• Tap the boost icon to boost the dog speed
• Tap the jump icon to jump.
Features:
• Professional dog racing tracks, these tracks are specially designed for dog race
• Attractive 3D environment, where people watch this ongoing dog race.
• Interactive GUI, one of the best compete.
• Cute and Smart dogs
• All dog breeds are present to choose the one you like most.
